Basic discord.py bot setup w/ commands e.description: Basic discord.py bot setup w/ commands extension

discord.on_bulk_message_delete.description:
Called when messages are bulk deleted. If none of the messages deleted
are found in the internal message cache, then this event will not be called.
If individual messages were not found in the internal message cache,
this event will still be called, but the messages not found will not be included in
the messages list. Messages might not be in cache if the message is too old
or the client is participating in high traffic guilds.

discord.on_connect.description:
Called when the client has successfully connected to Discord. This is not
the same as the client being fully prepared, see on_ready() for that.

discord.on_disconnect.description:
Called when the client has disconnected from Discord. This could happen either through
the internet being disconnected, explicit calls to logout, or Discord terminating the connection
one way or the other.

discord.on_error.description:
Usually when an event raises an uncaught exception, a traceback is
printed to stderr and the exception is ignored. If you want to
change this behaviour and handle the exception for whatever reason
yourself, this event can be overridden. Which, when done, will
suppress the default action of printing the traceback.

body: async def on_group_join(channel, user, channel, user):
discord.on_group_join.description: Called when someone joins or leaves a GroupChannel.

discord.on_guild_available.description:
Called when a guild becomes available or unavailable. The guild must have
existed in the Client.guilds cache.

discord.on_guild_channel_delete.description: Called whenever a guild channel is deleted or created.

discord.on_guild_channel_pins_update.description: Called whenever a message is pinned or unpinned from a guild channel.

discord.on_guild_channel_update.description: Called whenever a guild channel is updated. e.g. changed name, topic, permissions.

discord.on_guild_emojis_update.description: Called when a Guild adds or removes Emoji.

discord.on_guild_integrations_update.description: Called whenever an integration is created, modified, or removed from a guild.

discord.on_guild_join.description:
Called when a Guild is either created by the Client or when the
Client joins a guild.

discord.on_guild_remove.description: Called when a Guild is removed from the Client.

discord.on_guild_role_create.description: Called when a Guild creates or deletes a new Role.

discord.on_guild_role_update.description: Called when a Role is changed guild-wide.

discord.on_guild_update.description: Called when a Guild updates, for example:

discord.on_member_ban.description: Called when user gets banned from a Guild.

discord.on_member_join.description: Called when a Member leaves or joins a Guild.

discord.on_member_unban.description: Called when a User gets unbanned from a Guild.

discord.on_member_update.description: Called when a Member updates their profile.

discord.on_message.description: Called when a Message is created and sent.

discord.on_message_delete.description:
Called when a message is deleted. If the message is not found in the
internal message cache, then this event will not be called.
Messages might not be in cache if the message is too old
or the client is participating in high traffic guilds.

discord.on_message_edit.description:
Called when a Message receives an update event. If the message is not found
in the internal message cache, then these events will not be called.
Messages might not be in cache if the message is too old
or the client is participating in high traffic guilds.

discord.on_private_channel_delete.description: Called whenever a private channel is deleted or created.

discord.on_private_channel_pins_update.description: Called whenever a message is pinned or unpinned from a private channel.

discord.on_private_channel_update.description: Called whenever a private group DM is updated. e.g. changed name or topic.

discord.on_raw_bulk_message_delete.description:
Called when a bulk delete is triggered. Unlike on_bulk_message_delete(), this is
called regardless of the messages being in the internal message cache or not.

discord.on_raw_message_delete.description:
Called when a message is deleted. Unlike on_message_delete(), this is
called regardless of the message being in the internal message cache or not.

discord.on_raw_message_edit.description:
Called when a message is edited. Unlike on_message_edit(), this is called
regardless of the state of the internal message cache.

discord.on_raw_reaction_add.description:
Called when a message has a reaction added. Unlike on_reaction_add(), this is
called regardless of the state of the internal message cache.

discord.on_raw_reaction_clear.description:
Called when a message has all its reactions removed. Unlike on_reaction_clear(),
this is called regardless of the state of the internal message cache.

discord.on_raw_reaction_remove.description:
Called when a message has a reaction removed. Unlike on_reaction_remove(), this is
called regardless of the state of the internal message cache.

discord.on_reaction_add.description:
Called when a message has a reaction added to it. Similar to on_message_edit(),
if the message is not found in the internal message cache, then this
event will not be called.

discord.on_reaction_clear.description:
Called when a message has all its reactions removed from it. Similar to on_message_edit(),
if the message is not found in the internal message cache, then this event
will not be called.

discord.on_reaction_remove.description:
Called when a message has a reaction removed from it. Similar to on_message_edit,
if the message is not found in the internal message cache, then this event
will not be called.

discord.on_ready.description:
Called when the client is done preparing the data received from Discord. Usually after login is successful
and the Client.guilds and co. are filled up.

discord.on_relationship_add.description:
Called when a Relationship is added or removed from the
ClientUser.

discord.on_relationship_update.description:
Called when a Relationship is updated, e.g. when you
block a friend or a friendship is accepted.

discord.on_resumed.description: Called when the client has resumed a session.

discord.on_shard_ready.description:
Similar to on_ready() except used by AutoShardedClient
to denote when a particular shard ID has become ready.

discord.on_socket_raw_receive.description:
Called whenever a message is received from the WebSocket, before
itâs processed. This event is always dispatched when a message is
received and the passed data is not processed in any way.

discord.on_socket_raw_send.description:
Called whenever a send operation is done on the WebSocket before the
message is sent. The passed parameter is the message that is being
sent to the WebSocket.

discord.on_typing.description: Called when someone begins typing a message.

discord.on_user_update.description: Called when a User updates their profile.

discord.on_voice_state_update.description: Called when a Member changes their VoiceState.

discord.on_webhooks_update.description: Called whenever a webhook is created, modified, or removed from a guild channel.
